Description.Text: Located in Núcleo Bandeirante region, Vida Plaza Hotel features free WiFi access, a free daily breakfast and a restaurant. The property boasts free on-site parking and a 24-hour front-desk.Accommodation is provided in rooms with contemporary décor, which come ideally equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include cable channels.Brasilia's Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport is 5 km away. Tres Poderes Square is situated 16 km away.
